languages.text: "Хм". {n}Маражай прожигает взглядом Караэля, а затем вновь переводит его на Назракея.{/n} "Тогда зачем же ты, Караэль, столь чудно послужил мне, приведя сюда моего заклятого врага? И он, и ошметки Опустошительной бури будут моими..." {n}Маражай хлопает по ловцу душ, свисающему с пояса, и издевательски смеется.{/n} "...и я буду вечно слушать ваши муки!"

"Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"
languages.original_text: "Хм". {n}Маражай прожигает взглядом Караэля, а затем вновь переводит его на Назракея.{/n} "Тогда зачем же ты, Караэль, столь чудно послужил мне, приведя сюда моего заклятого врага? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai durchbohrt Kharael mit seinem Blick, ehe er ihn wieder auf Nazrakhei richtet.{/n} "Warum habt Ihr mir dann so gut gedient, indem Ihr meinen Erzfeind hergebracht habt, Kharael? Sowohl er als auch die Überreste des plündernden Sturms werden mir gehören." {n}Marazhai schlägt gegen die Seelenfalle, die an seinem Gürtel hängt, und lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Und ich werde mir Eure Qualen ewig anhören!"
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai durchbohrt Kharael mit seinem Blick, ehe er ihn wieder auf Nazrakhei richtet.{/n} "Warum habt Ihr mir dann so gut gedient, indem Ihr meinen Erzfeind hergebracht habt, Kharael? Sowohl er als auch die Überreste des plündernden Sturms werden mir gehören." {n}Marazhai schlägt gegen die Seelenfalle, die an meinem Gürtel hängt, und lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Und ich werde mir Eure Qualen ewig anhören!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “嗯。”{n}玛拉斋的目光仿佛要刺穿卡瑞尔，随后移向纳札骸。{/n}“既然如此，那你为什么要这么好心，把我的宿敌带到我的面前，卡瑞尔？他和狂风的残兵败将都将归我所有……”{n}玛拉斋拍了拍挂在腰带上的灵魂陷阱，嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“……我将永远聆听你们的痛苦之歌！”
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"

traits.locale_text: “嗯。”{n}玛拉斋的目光仿佛要刺穿卡瑞尔，随后移向纳札骸。{/n}“既然如此，那你为什么要这么好心，把我的宿敌带到我的面前，卡瑞尔？他和狂风的残兵败将都将归我所有……”{n}玛拉斋拍了拍挂在腰带上的灵魂陷阱，嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“……我将永远聆听你们的痛苦之歌！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Hmm... » {n}Marazhai transperce Kharael du regard avant de reporter son attention sur Nazrakhei.{/n} « Alors, pourquoi m'avez-vous si bien servi en m'amenant mon ennemi juré, Kharael ? Lui et les rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse seront à moi... » {n}Marazhai tapote le piège à âmes suspendu à sa ceinture avec un rire mordant.{/n} « ...et je me délecterai à jamais de vos plaintes d'agonie ! »
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... » {n}Marazhai transperce Kharael du regard avant de reporter son attention sur Nazrakhei.{/n} « Alors, pourquoi m'avez-vous si bien servi en m'amenant mon ennemi juré, Kharael ? Lui et les rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse seront à moi... » {n}Marazhai tapote le piège à âmes suspendu à sa ceinture avec un rire mordant.{/n} « ...et je me délecterai à jamais de vos plaintes d'agonie ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mmm». {n}Marazhai atraviesa a Kharael con la mirada antes de girarse hacia Nazrakhei.{/n} «Entonces, ¿por qué me has servido tan bien al atraer a mi enemigo jurado, Kharael? Tanto él como los restos de la Tempestad Asoladora serán míos...». {n}Marazhai da una palmada a la trampa de almas que le cuelga del cinturón y ríe desdeñoso.{/n} «... ¡y podré escuchar tu agonía eternamente!».
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"

traits.locale_text: «Mmm». {n}Marazhai atraviesa a Kharael con la mirada antes de girarse hacia Nazrakhei.{/n} «Entonces, ¿por qué me has servido tan bien al atraer a mi enemigo jurado, Kharael? Tanto él como los restos de la Tempestad Asoladora serán míos...». {n}Marazhai da una palmada a la trampa para almas que le cuelga del cinturón y ríe desdeñoso.{/n} «... ¡y podré escuchar tu agonía eternamente!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ」{n}マラズハイはナズラクヘイへと目線を戻す前に、カラエルに鋭い視線を送る。{/n}「ならばお前はなぜ、俺様の宿敵をここに連れてくような真似までして奉仕しているんだ、カラエル？奴も略奪の嵐の残党も俺のものだ」{n}マラズハイはベルトの前に下げているソウルトラップを無造作に叩き、バカにするような笑い声を上げる。{/n}「…そして俺様はお前の苦悩をずっと聞くのだろうな！」
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ」{n}マラズハイはナズラクヘイへと目線を戻す前に、カラエルに鋭い視線を送る。{/n}「ならばお前はなぜ、俺様の宿敵をここに連れてくような真似までして奉仕しているんだ、カラエル？奴も略奪の嵐の残党も俺のものだ」{n}マラズハイはベルトの前に下げているソウルトラップを無造作に叩き、バカにするような笑い声を上げる。{/n}「…そして俺様はお前の苦悩をずっと聞くのだろうな！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hımm." {n}Bakışlarıyla Kharael'i delip geçen Marazhai, sonrasında yeniden Nazrakhei'e odaklanıyor.{/n} "O hâlde neden can düşmanımı buraya getirip bana böylesine güzel bir hizmette bulundun Kharael? Hem o hem de Müfteris Kasırga'dan arda kalanlar benim olacak..." {n}Marazhai, kemerine asılı Ruh Tuzağı'nı tokatlayıp alaycı bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Izdırabını sonsuza kadar dinleyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Marazhai pierces Kharael with his gaze before shifting it back to Nazrakhei.{/n} "Then why did you serve me so well by bringing my sworn enemy here, Kharael? Both he and the remnants of the Reaving Tempest will be mine..." {n}Marazhai slaps the Soul-Trap hanging from his belt and laughs derisively.{/n} "...and I will forever listen to your agony!"

traits.locale_text: "Hımm." {n}Marazhai bakışlarıyla Kharael'i delip geçiyor, ardından tekrar Nazrakhei'e odaklanıyor.{/n} "O hâlde neden can düşmanımı buraya getirerek bana böylesine güzel bir hizmette bulundun Kharael? Hem o hem de Müfteris Kasırga'dan geriye kalanlar benim olacak." {n}Marazhai kemerine asılı Ruh Tuzağı'nı tokatlıyor ve alaycı bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Ve ızdırabını sonsuza kadar dinleyeceğim!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
